title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: December 16, 2023, 02:04:27 PMLast edit: May 16, 2024, 03:52:36 PM by cygan
content: Dear Bitcoiners,We are thrilled to introduce our latest release : the Bitcointalk Hat card editionfirst of all I would like to thank the following users on behalf of the entire Icarus team - without you and your approval this great edition would never have come about:AlcoHoDL - BitcoinGirl.Club - efialtis - El duderino_ - fillippone - mikeywith - minerjones - Ratimov - shahzadafzal - xhomerx10The Hat editions will be buyer funded. You can load your card if you wish. There are a total of 10 designs (each design has a mintage of 21 cards) in this edition - 7 of them are on sale now and the remaining 3 (BitcoinGirl.Club - efialtis - xhomerx10) will follow in the next few weeks, but can also be pre-ordered now in this sale.here you can already see the three designs (not finished yet):as there are only 21 cards in this edition, all buyers are treated equally and the advantage of a subscription is suspended here.the principle of whoever orders first gets the card/s ordered applies here. you can order individual cards as well as the complete set of 10 cards - the prices can be found at the bottom of the pageIcarus Bitcointalk Hat Edition🔐🧢Code:HAT.ALCOHODL.1     :bc1qs9rfsvm4p63s8t5658v886crnekr8vfa25ee6lHAT.ALCOHODL.2 My collection will have to go without these.are you telling me the #10 is available to me or not to me? second edit - now that I look on a pc vs my cracked up phone screen, where I can read clearly.pymt sent via strike - will provide txn id once they provide it.as a note - tried to send it via LN but it said your invoice had expired.Pymt txn id: dbca9970dfb624fdb7325950bef32048fe48845749e9f6ff5f9dfd49616dadad
